ygData.subject: 1H Blunts
ygData.msgSnippet: ... blunt with my other wizard characters and am familiar with the order they go.  I am planning to use 1H for second hand items and writhing staff. Sorry for
ygData.messageBody:
>>I meant what one-handed blunt would be the next step. I have used the 2H
blunt with my other wizard characters and am familiar with the order they
go. I am planning to use 1H for second hand items and writhing staff.
Sorry for the inconvenience.<<

Your next step would be to get the Slime Crystal Staff in Runnyeye, Water
Crystal Staff from the aqua goblin in Lake Rathe, then the Ice Crystal Staff
from the Scryer(I think) in Permafrost. Then you move on to Solusek where
you get the Staff of Fire on the A side and the Staff of Writhing on the B
side.

Hope that is what you were looking for.

Yours,

~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr
